channel.title: Need help on a few things. thanks
channel.description:
1. ok, i am wondering how do i make a item so only admin+ can use. basicly i want to know how to make a item not spawnable under playerights 2.
if anyone can help, thanks.
2. i want to make a shop (which i have) which sells rares (i have) but i want to make it so you dont play money, you pay pk points for them. anyone can help me, thanks.
related: i have got pk points when you kill someone but i want it to say that you have just recieved 1 pk point. like make it so i can use a certain amount for the shop but you gotta kill players for them.
if anyone can help me with these codes and where to put then thanks,
please help me with both as much as you can.
thanks,
luke.

item.title: Need help on a few things. thanks
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Not to be annoying, but I bet if you searched hard enough on the search bar you could find this. Or use Google. I found a tutorial about 2 weeks ago on Google about the currency problem, and the equipping question is often asked around here.

Read full topic
